means: 漏壶，水时计（昔时的计时器）

word_mean: 古代用水从容器中流出的量来计量时刻的计时仪器。由置水的容器和计量水量（有刻划）的标杆组成。

sentence.Network_en: Many ancient Chinese men of letters left behind beautiful verses about the clepsydra.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为计时器,漏刻的使用比日晷史为普遍.

sentence.Network_en: Galileo used a mercury clepsydra to time his experimental falling Bodies.
sentence.Network_cn: 直到16世纪时,迦利略还用水银漏壶为其自由落体实验计时.

sentence.Network_en: The invention and use sundial, clepsydra and other time - measuring machines is evidence of Chinese wisdom.
sentence.Network_cn: 漏刻等计时仪器的发明和应用, 证明中华民族是个充满智慧的民族.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2010年5月23日 - 时间是通过水钟或漏壶(clepsydra)来计算的,漏壶(clepsydra)字面上意为偷取时间,希腊文中的kleptes也就是盗贼之意。讼棍、法官以及整个社会,一直都生活.
滴字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 滴溜儿〖 veryround〗 滴漏〖 clepsydra〗 滴瓶〖 droppingbottle〗.

list.abs: ... . . .ta)光海鳝(Muraena argus)澳大利亚海鳝(Muraena australiae)锐齿海鳝(Muraena clepsydra)地中海海鳝(Muraena helena)岛海鳝(Muraena insularum)雀斑海鳝.

the steelyard clepsydra , a special type of clepsydra , had been the chief timekeeping instrument during the Sui-Tang period and the earlier stage of the Northern Song dynasty .摘要秤漏是一种特殊类型的漏刻，在隋唐及北宋前期曾是司天机构的主要计时仪器。

the steelyard clepsydra , a special type of clepsydra , had been the chief timekeeping instrument during the Sui-Tang period and the earlier stage of the Northern Song dynasty .摘要秤漏是一种特殊类型的漏刻，在隋唐及北宋前期曾是司天机构的主要计时仪器。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Latin from Greek klepsudra, based on kleptein 'steal' + hudōr 'water'

means.word_mean: 1. clock that measures time by the escape of water
